header.cta: See if we’re consigning works for your artist
header.headline: Sell your Works on Artsy
header.subheadline: Sell from your collection via Artsy’s partner galleries and auction houses.

cta.headline: See if we’re consigning works for your artist

estimate.description: Within 10 days of your submission, get a free estimate of what your artwork is worth based on the experience of our in house specialist and vast art market data.
estimate.headline: Get a free, timely estimate on works in your collection

placement.description: We’ll try and match you with one of our stellar auction partners that are continuously running auctions on Artsy across the globe at industry competitive seller’s commission.
placement.headline: Get your work placed with top auctions and galleries

privacy.description: Artsy will keep all of your information and identity concealed until an agreement is met between you and the consigning auction house or gallery.
privacy.headline: Your privacy is our top concern

recently_sold.headline: Recently sold at auction on Artsy

steps.description: Upload an image of the artwork you want to sell
Add a few details like artist and dimensions
Your contact so we can follow up with estimates and next steps

credit: Photographs by Emily Johnston, Alex John Beck, and Amanda Kho for Artsy
